name: Room of Roots
longDesc: This room hangs thick with moisture. Clearly you're deep underground, as the roots of the many trees descend from the greenhouse and jungle above and hang from the ceiling.
shortDesc: A room with walls made of thick, entwined roots.

shelves.name: Hedera Hibernica
shelves.desc: You notice a lush, green ivy with small white flowers.

shelves.name: Climbing Hydrangea
shelves.desc: You haven't seen one of these in a long time!  You admire the floral-like vine with bunches of tiny flowers.

doors.name: Darkness
doors.desc: The unwelcoming darkness creeps up behind you.  The ladder is still there if you wish to turn back.

doors.name: Slick Stones
doors.desc: A path of water-slicked stones leads off towards the sound of a waterfall.
